title: Coronavirus and social relationships and support for vulnerable groups
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: A summary of social relationships and social support for vulnerable groups, including older adults and those with a self-defined disability or who are Equality Act Disabled.
datasetNotes: On the landing page under your download options click on the latest release
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with footnotes although the structure varies from tab to tab
